name: Inf121.GitHub.io
body:
INF 121 - Functional programming
=============

[Main page (in French)](http://www-verimag.imag.fr/~mounier/Enseignement/INF121/)

For any question, feel free to contact me at [frederic.bouquet@viseo.com](mailto://frederic.bouquet@viseo.com) or
Laurent Mounier at [Laurent.Mounier@imag.fr](mailto://Laurent.Mounier@imag.fr)

Slides
=============

* [General information](dwl/0-general-information.pdf)
* [Introduction, simple expressions and simple types](dwl/1-intro-simpleexpr-simpletypes.pdf)
* [Identifiers and functions](dwl/2-identifiers-functions.pdf)
* [Advanced types](dwl/3-advanced-types.pdf)
* [Recursion](dwl/4-recursion.pdf)
* [Lists](dwl/5-lists.pdf)
* [Polymorphism, Higher order, Currying](dwl/6-polymorphism-higherorder.pdf)
* [Tree-based structures](dwl/7-trees.pdf)

External resources
=============

* [Online Ocaml interpreter](http://try.ocamlpro.com/)
* Book (French): Approche fonctionnelle de la programmation - Guy Cousineau et Michel Mauny. Ediscience (Collection Informatique), Paris, 1995, ISBN 2-84074-114-8.
* Book (French): Développement d'applications avec Objective Caml - Emmanuel Chailloux, Pascal Manoury et Bruno Pagano. Editions O'Reilly, Paris, 2000, ISBN 2-84177-121-0.
* Book (French): Manuel de référence du langage Caml - Xavier Leroy et Pierre Weis. InterEditions, Paris, 1993, ISBN 2-7296-0492-8. [PDF version](http://caml.inria.fr/pub/distrib/books/llc.pdf)
* [Ocaml Inria web site](http://caml.inria.fr/ocaml/index.en.html)
* [OCaml Manual](http://caml.inria.fr/pub/docs/manual-ocaml/index.html)
* [Caml programming guidelines](http://caml.inria.fr/resources/doc/guides/guidelines.en.html)
* [O'Caml Style Guide](http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~cis500/cis500-f06/resources/programming_style.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
